# Dependency test

`OrdinalPatterns.jl` allows to compute the dependency statistic based on @schnurr2017.


```{julia}
#| warning: false
using RCall
using OrdinalPatterns
using BenchmarkTools

tsx = rand(100)
tsy = rand(100)

# R
@rput tsx tsy
R"""
library(ordinalpattern)
result_dep = patterndependence(tsx, tsy)
result_dep$patterncoef |> print()

microbenchmark::microbenchmark(
  timing = patterndependence(tsx, tsy, tiesmethod="first"), times = 100
  )
"""
```

```{julia}
dependence_op(tsx, tsy; op_length=3, d=1)
@btime dependence_op(tsx, tsy; op_length=3, d=1)
```

```{julia}
changepoint_op(tsx, tsy, op_length=3)
```
